pages.title: Pearl Perfusion
pages.text: One of the ingredients you'll need for spellcrafting are the mysterious $(item)Nacre Pearls$(). It seems that exposing $(item)Glass Orbs$() to the unusual $(item)Nacre fluid$() causes it to coalesce onto the orbs, forming pearls of varying quality.
There seems to be a correlation between the quality and how long the orb is exposed to the liquid, but I never did discover exactly how long was best. Maybe one of the old masters did.

pages.heading: Creating a Nacre Pearl
pages.description: Different lengths of time in the liquid produces different qualities of pearl

pages.heading: Creating Liquid Nacre
pages.description: Transforms the $(item)Liquid Mana$() into $(item)Nacre$(), replacing it in the world. Can also be performed in a $(item)Cauldron$()
